hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing

Class SwingObservables.ObservableWindowListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.DefaultObservable<WindowEvent>
      • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing.SwingObservables.ObservableWindowListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<WindowEvent>, Observer<WindowEvent>, WindowFocusListener, WindowListener, WindowStateListener, Closeable, AutoCloseable, EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    SwingObservables

    public static class SwingObservables.ObservableWindowListener
extends DefaultObservable<WindowEvent>
implements WindowListener, WindowFocusListener, WindowStateListener
    The observable window listener which relays events from WindowListener, WindowFocusListener and WindowStateListener. The WindowEvent.getID() contains the original event type:
    • WindowListener events:
      • WindowEvent.WINDOW_OPENED
      • WindowEvent.WINDOW_CLOSING
      • WindowEvent.WINDOW_CLOSED
      • WindowEvent.WINDOW_ICONIFIED
      • WindowEvent.WINDOW_DEICONIFIED
      • WindowEvent.WINDOW_ACTIVATED
      • WindowEvent.WINDOW_DEACTIVATEd
    • WindowFocusListener events:
      • WindowEvent.WINDOW_GAINED_FOCUS
      • WindowEvent.WINDOW_LOST_FOCUS
    • WindowStateListener events:
      • WindowEvent.WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED
    This observable never signals finish() or error().
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.02.01.

      • register

        @Nonnull
public static SwingObservables.ObservableWindowListener register(@Nonnull
                                                         Window component)
        Convenience method to register an observer on the component for all window event types. To unregister, use the Component.removeMouseListener(), Component.removeMouseMotionListener() and Component.removeMouseWheelListener() methods.
        Parameters:
        component - the target component.
        Returns:
        the new observable

      • registerWith

        @Nonnull
public SwingObservables.ObservableWindowListener registerWith(@Nonnull
                                                             Window component)
        Convenience method to register this observer with the target component for all window event types. To deregister this observable, use the unregisterFrom().
        Parameters:
        component - the target component
        Returns:
        this

      • registerWith

        @Nonnull
public SwingObservables.ObservableWindowListener registerWith(@Nonnull
                                                             Window component,
                                                             boolean normal,
                                                             boolean focus,
                                                             boolean state)
        Convenience method to register this observer with the target component for any window event types. To deregister this observable, use the unregisterFrom().
        Parameters:
        component - the target component
        normal - register for normal events?
        focus - register for focus events?
        state - register for state events?
        Returns:
        this

public SwingObservables.ObservableWindowListener unregisterFrom(@Nonnull

        Returns:
